###  KeyMagic 3 - v0.0.4

  üéâ **What's New**

**‚å®Ô∏è Better Keyboard Switching**
- Keyboard hotkeys now work as a toggle - press once to activate KeyMagic, press again to switch back to your system keyboard

**üì¶ Improved Updates**
- Updates now appear in a dedicated window with properly formatted release notes

- KeyMagic now prevents multiple copies from running at the same time
